// GameCard.js
import React from'react';import Card from'@mui/material/Card';import CardContent from'@mui/material/CardContent';import CardActions from'@mui/material/CardActions';import CardMedia from'@mui/material/CardMedia';import IconButton from'@mui/material/IconButton';import EditIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Edit';import PlayCircleFilledIcon from'@mui/icons-material/PlayCircleFilled';import DeleteIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Delete';import Typography from'@mui/material/Typography';import Tooltip from'@mui/material/Tooltip';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GameCard=_ref=>{let{game,handleEditGame,handlePlayGame,handleDeleteGame}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{style:{maxWidth:'240px',minWidth:'240px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardMedia,{component:"img",alt:game.name,height:"140",image:game.imageUrl,style:{objectFit:'cover',borderTopLeftRadius:'8px',borderTopRightRadius:'8px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardContent,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{children:game.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardActions,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{title:"Edit game",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{onClick:()=>handleEditGame(game.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EditIcon,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{title:"Play game",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{onClick:()=>handlePlayGame(game.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PlayCircleFilledIcon,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{title:"Delete game",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{onClick:()=>handleDeleteGame(game.id,game.name),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteIcon,{})})})]})]});};export default GameCard;
